WorkItem.ClosedComment: Already fixed, turn on all your filters
WorkItem.Description: The emblem trinket "Talisman of Resurgence" is not available to equip in the trinket slot. The item is included in the database (I have a saved character with this trinket equipped). When I load my saved character, the talisman is displayed and the DPS effect appears to be computed correctly (equivalent to v2.3.5). However, if I equip a different trinket, then the talisman no longer appears in the trinket list. At that point, I cannot equip the talisman (all I can do is reload the saved character).
WorkItem.Summary: [Items] Talisman of Resurgence not available for trinket slot

Comments.Message: Make sure your special currencies filter is on in the comparison filters (filter is on the right side of the window). The box was defaulted as off with the release of 2.3.6 (Prolly a fluke).
